protein.general_function: Involved in calcium-dependent cysteine-type endopeptidase inhibitor activity
protein.specific_function: Specific inhibition of calpain (calcium-dependent cysteine protease). Plays a key role in postmortem tenderization of meat and have been proposed to be involved in muscle protein degradation in living tissue
